channel.title: Phantom survival [survival game's , pvp , creative world , faction's , survival]
channel.description:
Thank you for taking a look at our server post we welcome you and your friends and family to our server so tell everyone you know PHANTOM SURVIVAL is the way to go for all your multiplayer fun. Our server started of with one founder and thats me 586hunter. I wanted to build a server with everything imaginable so i did i created PHANTOM SURVIVAL . I hand picked the best staff i could find i put lots of time in the server to make it a place for players to make friends and have fun. In this server i included meany games modes and they are Survival , Creative world , Survival games , and a server shop . We welcome you and all your friends and family SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR come and play on PHANTOM SURVIVAL. You can also rent a your own custom world right on our server for you friends ad family to play on. It is $15.00 a month and if you stop paying your world will be removed from the server but it will be saved for when you want to rent the world again another month. You can also send us your own custom worlds to put up for you. Your worlds will be private and no one will be able to enter them without the renters permission but admin and the owners can enter whenever. You can rent them right from our website. Have a great day and thank you for choosing PHANTOM SURVIVAL
IP:108.131.79.201
WEBSITE:http://phantomsurival.enjin.com Here u can get ranks and rent world's.
